metadata.title: CVE-2022-1205 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s AmateurRadio AX.25 protocol functionality in the way a user connects with theprotocol. This flaw allows a local user to crash the system.

criterions.comment: linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
